snippet.title: Tammy Davis-Charles: Australian nurse found guilty in Cambodia surrogacy trial
snippet.content: An Australian nurse will spend a year in a Cambodian prison after being found guilty of acting as an intermediary between an adoptive parent and a pregnant woman and fraudulently obtaining documents. Tammy Davis-Charles has been sentenced to 18 months imprisonment plus a $1,200 fine. She has already spent nine-months in pre-trial detention. More to come.
